Metadata.Title: CVE-2023-39325 affecting package kata-containers-cc for versions less than 3.2.0.azl4-1
Metadata.Description: CVE-2023-39325 affecting package kata-containers-cc for versions less than 3.2.0.azl4-1. An upgraded version of the package is available that resolves this issue.

Criterion.Comment: Package kata-containers-cc is earlier than 3.2.0.azl4-1, affected by CVE-2023-39325
